communications.subject: Vermont Public Records Act Request: Vermont Capitol Police roster
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Vermont Public Records Act, I hereby request roster and demographic information regarding the Capitol Police Department. For each officer in the department, please provide documentation sufficient to show:
- First and last name, and middle initial
- Race, gender, and year of birth
- Rank, badge number, and date of employment
- Job title and unit assignment
- Salary and overtime pay for 2022 (or FY 2022, whichever is applicable)

Sincerely,
Brian Waters

title: Presentation Slides from the 2023 Cadet Explorers Graduation

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: Presentation Slides from the 2023 Cadet Explorers Graduation
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all materials including emails, presentation slides, photographs, pamphlets, brochures, electronic messages and text messages related to the presentation at the 2023 Solano County Cadet Explorers Graduation.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Gregg Horton
